FuncDef: The preferred lifetime for the IPv6 prefix or address in the option, expressed in units of seconds. When the preferred lifetime expires, any derived addresses are deprecated.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the preferred lifetime is infinite.
Specifies the number of days of a preferred lifetime. Values-0 to 49710.
Specifies the number of hours of a preferred lifetime. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the number of minutes of a preferred lifetime. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the number of seconds of a preferred lifetime. Values-0 to 59.
